content: nereide a tunisian crochet pattern by silke reibeling required skills tunisian full stitch tunisian simple stitch binding off using single_crochet material 200 300 gr 7 10 5 oz yarn of your choice suitable tunisian hook with cable sample shown in 1 scheepjes whirl yardage 1000 m / 220 gr 1094 yds / 7 7 oz in sherbert rainbow hook size 4 5 mm us7 measurements approx 200 x 52 cm 79 x 20 in the size depends on your yarn and can be increased by working more row abbreviations chain chain single_crochet single_crochet yo yarn over tss tunisian simple stitch insert hook from right to left under next vertical bar yo and pull up a loop tfs tunisian full stitch insert hook in the space between two stitches yo and pull up a loop increase increase es edge stitch fp forward pass rp return pass hints to begin a fp always insert hook in second space skip the first space at the right edge nereide pattern by silke reibeling - www haekelreigen de do not copy sell translate or distribute without my permission increase one stitch per row at the left edge to do this work the stitch in front of the es in tss then work one tfs and insert hook under both strands for the es instructions chain 4 turn the chains slightly to the front in order to work into the third loop on the back pull up a loop in the horizontal bar of second chain from hook and each chain across 4 sts on hook rp yo and draw through one loop on hook chain 1 made yo and draw through 2 loops on hook until there is only one loop on the hook work all rps in this way fp 1 insert hook in second space yo and pull up a loop = 1 tfs 1 increase in tss 1 tfs es 5 sts fp 2 2 tfs 1 increase 1 tfs es 6 sts fp 3 3 tfs 1 increase 1 tfs es 7 sts all further fps tfs until two stitches remain 1 increase 1 tfs es repeat until yarn is almost used up finishing bind off all sts using single_crochet insert hook between sts yo and pull up a loop yo and pull through both loops weave in ends if yarn allows dampen edges slightly to flatten häkelreigen www haekelreigen de info@haekelreigen de nereide pattern by silke reibeling -
